name: LinksysSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the Wi-Fi for Wayne's phone”
”Alexa, turn off the Wi-Fi for Wayne's phone”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Linksys skill for Alexa lets you control the Wi-Fi connection of clients from any Linksys Smart Wi-Fi product. You must have a Linksys Smart Wi-Fi router with remote access enabled, and an active Linksys Smart Wi-Fi account. If you have more than one Linksys Smart Wi-Fi router, Alexa will only control the one most recently associated with your account. The supported router models are Linksys Velop Intelligent Mesh WiFi System (SKU WHW03 Series).
